name: Theft of Air
author: CrusaderDroid
desc:
In a 15 foot radius sphere, you steal away all air in the location. Creatures that need to breathe and are fully within the area must make a Constitution saving throw, having 1d6+2 hit dice destroyed on a failure and half as much on a success. If a creature has insufficient hit dice, they immediately drop to 0 hit points and pass out, unconscious.

Any creature that ends their turn in the area must repeat the saving throw.
empower: Hit die loss increased to 1d6+4. Radius increased to 20 feet. Also reduces the movement speed of creatures in the area by 10 feet.
